summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2625, for the improvement of East Marion Street, form 34th Avenue to 35th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 30720 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
